messages.message: On with colpal, coe has been playing around w/ AI Hub, shared feedback that multi doc not working (despite having multiple files selected, model seems to only use context from the most recently selected doc to generate answers). Have others experienced this?

can you share the question that they are asking, and what documents they have if possible -- short answer is no multi-doc doesn't just use the most recently selected doc, but the user might feel that way if the generated answer is what they have in mind.
Can you also double check they adding multiple files to the context vs just having multiple files in the conversation

thanks for the suggestion, figured user error could be culprit. The user will be sending detailed feedback when he’s finished testing so i’ll make sure to pass along. His email is <mailto:rajasekhar_sadu@colpal.com|rajasekhar_sadu@colpal.com> but not sure if this is the address he’s using for AI Hub…
when you say add more files to the context, you’re talking about the edit message scope button right?
